metadata.title: Al Capone Wears Ladies Underwear | Fugget About It | Adult Cartoon | Full Episode | TV Show

tracks.text: A limo
At the house
Jimmy punches Cheech in the face
It's an hour west of Regina
At Wayne Gretzky High School, Theresa does her makeup in the salon built into her locker.
A blind man
Johnny leaves
Typed text, RCMP Special Agent Strait McCool
At the house, Theresa looks at a book and makes hand gestures
Driving down the road in farm country
Walking down a street
Tickets
Cheech and Jimmy use a crow bar on a manhole cover. Gina buys tickets to the Al Capone's Tunnels Museum.
A fire place raises, revealing a secret tunnel down.
Gina hops on Cheech's head.
Gina pulls a brick
A wall opens, revealing 2 vaults. The right one has graffitti reading Geraldo was here! Gina points to the left one.
They enter a mostly empty vault.
Al Capone stands in a block of ice in an otherwise empty vault. Next to the Ice Capone is a chain with a sign reading, "To Thaw; Pull Chain".
Gina sees the sign and pulls the chain
Fire blasts Ice Capone, and the ice melts, revealing Al Capone, who steps forward.
The scientist hits the ice button, which freezes Capone and the scientist's hand. The hand falls off.
Billboard reads One-Armed Jake's Frozen Catsup! Going Strong For 75 Years
Cheech smiles, watching Al Capone flirt with the GPS. At Wayne Gretzky High School, Theresa approaches Johnny sitting on the front steps.
She pulls out Idiots Guide books on Wine, Nail polish removal, and Shakespeare.
At the house
Capone shoots the beer can. In her room, Theresa cries.
In the basement, Jimmy pulls back a carpet, punches through a wooden door, and pulls guns out from underneath.
A muscled man does chest presses. Jimmy watches the workout on TV while eating a messy sandwhich.
Looking in a mirror, Jimmy rips off his clothes, revealing a green tank top. He ties his boot laces, sharpens a hunting knife, and ties a red bandana around his head. It reads Experience Regina!!!
At the office
A man wearing a fedora knocks on the office door
Jimmy shoots an AR15 at the door
Toby screams. Jimmy shoots at the walls. An old lady hides behind a desk.
Jimmy fires wildly, eyes closed.
Time slows
Jimmy jumps and summersaults towards the door. Toby looks up from his bullet hole ridden desk. The old lady looks around from what remains of her desk.
The Fedora wearing tourist narrows his eyes.
At RCMP headquarters
A man checks his watch
A stone flies through a window. A note reads Meet Me Outside.
A bigger stone reads, It's from me... Jimmy Falcone strike McDougal
In a straight jacket
Margot Kidder Sanitarium. At Wayne Gretzky High School, Theresa approaches Johnny.
Their lips get closer
Theresa runs up to a student in a wheelchair
At the Margot Kidder Sanitarium
Jimmy tosses a paperclip in the air, and it lands on his tongue.
His eyes grow wide
He coughs the paperclip back up. A rope descends from the ceiling.
A book titled The Criminal's Code
Al pulls a sink off its plumbing and throws it through the window. Gina cuts off Jimmy's straps.
The 3 leap through the window.
Al runs off
